verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:34
verses.text: Thy hands were not bound, nor thy feet put into fetters: as a man falleth before wicked men, so fellest thou. And all the people wept again over him.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:35
verses.text: And when all the people came to cause David to eat meat while it was yet day, David sware, saying, So do God to me, and more also, if I taste bread, or ought else, till the sun be down.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:36
verses.text: And all the people took notice of it, and it pleased them: as whatsoever the king did pleased all the people.
